subs.text: Another post that came straight from a twitter thread.

I've been saying this a different way. We as citizens have been protesting. That's wrong. We must be demanding. Look where protesting got us. Our politicians, both parties, have forgotten they are responsible to us. Or more appropriately, we have forgotten.
subs.rawText: I've been saying this a different way.  We as citizens have been protesting.  That's wrong. We must be demanding.  Look where protesting got us.  Our politicians, both parties, have forgotten they are responsible to us.  Or more appropriately, we have forgotten.

subs.text: It's like going to the doctor, and they say okay we have to switch strategies from preventing to mitigating.   In other words you now have the disease we've been trying to prevent.  In Ohio they have a law that makes abortion illegal, now. Not in the future. Today. July 4, 2022.
subs.rawText: It's like going to the doctor, and they say okay we have to switch strategies from preventing to mitigating.   In other words you now have the disease we've been trying to prevent.  In Ohio they have a law that makes abortion illegal, now. Not in the future. Today. July 4, 2022.

subs.text: In other words, we have the disease.   We waited too long.  We didn't listen to the doctor.
subs.rawText: In other words, we have the disease.   We waited too long.  We didn't listen to the doctor.

subs.text: I look at what's happening in Ukraine, the Russians destroying cities just for the hell of it.  How far are we from having that happen everywhere?  How far from having it happen here?
subs.rawText: I look at what's happening in Ukraine, the Russians destroying cities just for the hell of it.  How far are we from having that happen everywhere?  How far from having it happen here?

subs.text: But wait, it's even worse than that.  They are preventing Ukraine's wheat from reaching the world. We will see the results of that soon.  So it's not just Ukraine that they're destroying.   Now come on connect the dots.  Trump is Russia. The Repubs are Russia.
subs.rawText: But wait, it's even worse than that.  They are preventing Ukraine's wheat from reaching the world. We will see the results of that soon.  So it's not just Ukraine that they're destroying.   Now come on connect the dots.  Trump is Russia. The Repubs are Russia.

subs.text: Here's the nightmare. The police are Russia too.
subs.rawText: Here's the nightmare. The police are Russia too.

subs.text: We're funding our enemy right now. Arming them. Giving them everything they ask for.
subs.rawText: We're funding our enemy right now. Arming them. Giving them everything they ask for.

subs.text: The nightmare is that an awful lot of our military thinks Trump was just right.
subs.rawText: The nightmare is that an awful lot of our military thinks Trump was just right.

subs.text: Protest is pointless unless it leads to something.
subs.rawText: Protest is pointless unless it leads to something.
